statements: DELETE FROM expiry_notifications WHERE notification_id = 100 AND notification_type = 'Warning';
DELETE FROM stock WHERE id = 10 AND product_name = 'Apple';
DELETE FROM expiry_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'email' AND expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM StockProduct WHERE product_id = 10 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM AlertsHistory WHERE resolved = true;
DELETE FROM ExpiryAlerts WHERE alert_date < '2023-01-01' AND alert_message LIKE '%expired%';
DELETE FROM stock_quantity WHERE quantity_id = 100 AND location_id = 5;
